summary: a SLIME like environment for the Clojure programming language
name: Gorilla
description: Gorilla is now merged with VimClojure (vimscript #2501).

versions.release_notes:
This is a compatibility release for Clojure >= SVN rev1192 and Clojure Contrib >= SVN rev331.
If you are using earlier revisions of Clojure and Contrib, eg. the December Release of Clojure
you don't need this release.
